messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Thanks Everyone!
messages.msgSnippet: ... Also be in there doing your routine at the same time and ask her if she d like to brush with you. I remember being sent to get ready for bed and brushing
messages.messageBody:
On Oct 9, 2007, at 12:32 AM, kellmar98 wrote:

> And thanks for giving all the great ideas. I am just going to remind
> her from time to time.

Also be in there doing your routine at the same time and ask her if
she'd like to brush with you. I remember being sent to get ready for
bed and brushing teeth was interminable! I was so conscious of doing
it while others were doing other things and *I* could have been doing
other things that the seconds it took seemed to last half an hour.

Eventually (but how long that will be can't be known ;-) she'll be
able to do it without thinking about it and it won't seem that big of
a deal.

Joyce

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Thanks Everyone!
messages.msgSnippet: who answered my teeth brushing post. Y all made me realize I am over-reacting by saying her teeth are gonna rot out of her mouth.....although her sisters
messages.messageBody:
who answered my teeth brushing post.

Y'all made me realize I am over-reacting by saying her teeth are gonna
rot out of her mouth.....although her sisters might, but that's a
different story.

And thanks for giving all the great ideas. I am just going to remind
her from time to time.....gently, and next time we hit Target maybe we
will make more options available to her so it's a fun thing. Although
she is allergic to food dye, so I do have to be careful with what kind
of toothpaste or mouth wash.

Kelly
